Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gamecharacter

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy.Gravity
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gamecharacter.GameChar
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gamecharacter.Hero
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject
public class Hero extends GameChar
A Hero is an object.gamecharacter that is controllable by the player. Of all the object, only Hero has KeyBindings. Hero can shoot HeroProjectiles, shield from attacks, trigger a special attack and collect Fruits for points.
Author:
YyuanZhou
